results.title: Caroline
results.creator_credit: Clement Perron, Georges Dufaux and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: To the public she is the pleasant, never-ruffled handler of everyone’s complaints at the telephone company. But behind her calm exterior the film reveals her doubts about her personal life, the domestic world of husband and child.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Clement Perron, Georges Dufaux and National Film Board of Canada

results.title: Cars
results.creator_credit: John Lasseter, Darla Anderson, Pixar Animation Studios and Walt Disney Pictures
results.brief_description: Hotshot race car Lightning McQueen (given voice by Owen Wilson) is living life in the fast lane until he hits a detour on his way to the most important race of his life. Stranded in Radiator Springs, a forgotten town on the old Route 66, he meets Sally, Mater, Doc Hudson (Paul Newman) and a variety of quirky characters who help him discover that there’s more to life than trophies and fame. Another hit animated feature from the studios of Pixar that will delight young and young-at-heart audiences alike. Also features the voices of Cheech Marin, Tom Hanks, Billy Crystal, John Goodman and many others. Original score composed and conducted by Randy Newman.

results.title: Carrousel
results.creator_credit: Bernard Longpre and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: A visual poem, vivid, lyrical, as intriguing in its colour fantasy as in the beauty of its images. This is an escape from a merry-go-round of painted horses suddenly turned to flesh and blood, making a wild plunge for freedom. But these are horses of extraordinary colour - lime, mauve, bronze and gold - as if caught in some mysterious kaleidoscope of the dawn. A technical triumph, these unusual effects were achieved in the printing process. (Awards: Teheran, Colombo, Tel Aviv, Philadelphia)
results.creator_credit_for_label: Bernard Longpre and National Film Board of Canada

results.title: Carried away
results.creator_credit: Vonnie von Helmolt, Michael Scott and Destiny Deacon
results.brief_description: A combination of animation and live-action which celebrates the creative process. A stylised exercise using black and white photographs to represent reality and coloured overlays representing flights of fantasy. The artist learns by trial and error to take possession of his creative energy. Useful in the areas of art, media studies and as a stimulus to discussion in English classes.

results.title: Carreras, Domingo, Pavarotti in Concert
results.brief_description: This program features Jose Carreras, Placido Domingo and Luciano Pavarotti in concert in Caracalla, Rome, with the Orchestras of Maggio Musicale Fiorenti and Teatro Dell’ Opera di Roma conducted by Zubin Mehta.

results.title: Carnival in Quebec
results.creator_credit: Jean Palardy, Roger Blais and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: A colorful record of Quebec City’s winter carnival - with all the fun and frolic of a southern Mardi Gras but in gleaming winter setting. Fine examples of snow sculpture, pageants, parades, sporting events, a torch-light parade on skis, folk dancing and fireworks, fill three weeks of festivities and pay due respect to King Winter.

results.title: Basilisk stare
results.creator_credit: Chryss Carr, Mis Kamieniak and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
A psychosexual drama which launches the viewer into the inner-space of the male psyche in order to depict the way the modern male constructs sex. The film excites and disturbs the viewer with the use of a split screen, which allows for the pitching of two images against each other in order to create a sense of both excitement and voyeuristic curiosity.
Cast includes David Wenham, Amy Pedersen and Jared Turner

results.title: Car park
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Leesa Kahn and Darcy Yuille
results.brief_description: Welcome to the world of Car Park - a multi-layered absurdist satire on the nature of relationships, communication and finding a parking space when you need one.

results.title: Birthday boy
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Andrew Gregory and Sejong Park
results.brief_description: Korea 1951 - little Manuk is playing on the streets of his village and dreaming of life at the front where his father is a soldier. He returns home to find a parcel on the doorstep and, thinking it is a birthday present, he opens it. But its contents will change his life.

results.title: The Other son
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Rachel Roberts and Heng Tang
results.brief_description: Vera is the meticulous wife, mother and reigning matriarch of her palatial home. She manages her domestic domain with digital clockwork precision. It is 7pm and dinner time. Her dutiful husband and beautiful son take their designated places at the table. However, the tranquillity is interrupted by the sudden appearance of an intruder threatening to shatter Vera’s utopia. Original format 35mm/colour.
